name: overdose_nosto

infos.name: Nosto – Personalisierte Produktempfehlungen für Shopware 6
infos.description:
Nosto ermöglicht es Shopware Händlern, authentische und relevante Online-Einkaufserlebnisse über jeden Touchpoint und jedes Gerät zu liefern.


Durch unsere Commerce Experience Platform (CXP), die auf Benutzerfreundlichkeit ausgelegt ist, ermöglicht es Nosto Händlern, personalisierte Erlebnisse zu erstellen, zu starten und zu optimieren, ohne dass spezielle Entwicklerressourcen oder ein langwieriger Implementierungsprozess erforderlich sind. Führende Handelsmarken in über 100 Ländern nutzen Nosto, um dein Geschäft auszubauen und ihre Kunden zu begeistern.


Commerce Experience Platform Produktangebot


  • Personalisierungs-Core: Dashboard und Analytik, Katalog-Explorer und Produkt-Insights, A/B-Tests und Optimierung, Segmentierung und Verhaltensanalysen, Out-Of-The-Box-Integrationen, prädiktive Algorithmen für maschinelles Lernen
  • Module: Produktempfehlungen, Produkt-Suche, Kategorie-Merchandising, Content-Personalisierung, Pop-Ups, dynamische Bundles, E-Mail-Personalisierung, visuelle nutzergenerierte Inhalte


Mit der Commerce Experience Platform von Nosto kannst Du:


  • Dynamische, relevante und authentische Einkaufserlebnisse schnell und einfach bereitstellen. Dank unserer intuitiven Benutzeroberfläche und der robusten Liste an vorgefertigten Integrationen brauchen Sie keinen Entwickler, um jedem Kunden, der Ihren Online-Shop besucht, ein personalisiertes Erlebnis zu bieten.
  • Sei deinen Käufern einen Schritt voraus. Unser einzigartiger Ansatz, Produkt- und Käuferdaten in Echtzeit zu aktualisieren, bedeutet, dass das Erlebnis für jeden Kunden wirklich personalisiert ist. Verabschiede dich von irrelevanten Bildern, Texten und Produkteindrücken, die deinem Markenimage und deinem Umsatz schaden können.
  • Leite deine Kunden auf Schritt und Tritt. Unsere Plattform nutzt die Vorteile von Personalisierung, Merchandising und visuellem UGC bei mehr Interaktionen vor Ort als jede andere Plattform. Von komplettem Suchlösung, Kategorie-Merchandising bis hin zu automatisierten Produktbündeln - die Möglichkeiten zur Schaffung wertvoller Erfahrungen sind endlos.
  • Für diejenigen, die einen traditionellen Shopware-Shop eingerichtet haben, bieten wir einfach zu verwendende Platzierungen für die Implementierung von personalisierten Produktempfehlungen und Inhalten. Diejenigen, die über eine Headless- oder benutzerdefinierte Shopware-Einrichtung verfügen, können unsere Session-API verwenden, um unsere Personalisierungsfunktionen in ihrer benutzerdefinierten Einrichtung zu nutzen.


Wenn Sie weitere Hilfe benötigen, folgen Sie bitte diesem Link für eine detaillierte Dokumentation: https://overdosedigital.atlassian.net/wiki/external/3034087513/YjYxYTg3MDY4MWY1NDE5MmI4NWU0MDk5YmU1YWJjMDk?atlOrigin=eyJpIjoiNzRjZWNiZjA3NDgwNGFjYWE3ODJhNzc5Mjc3NjQwOWUiLCJwIjoiYyJ9
infos.installationManual:
Hier wird die standardmäßige Shopware 6-Plugin-Installation angewendet.

Wenn Sie ein Benutzer sind, folgen Sie bitte diesem offiziellen Shopware 6-Leitfaden - https://docs.shopware.com/en/shopware-6-en/extensions/myextensions#installing-extensions

Wenn Sie ein Entwickler sind, können Sie dieser Anleitung folgen - https://www.shopware.com/en/news/using-composer-for-plugin-installation-in-shopware/
infos.shortDescription: Nostos führende Personalisierungslösung nutzt die Stärke von Big Data (KI), um Ihren Online Shop und jeden Ihrer Besucher bis ins Detail zu verstehen!

Kategorie-Merchandising

Dynamische Bundles

infos.name: Nosto – Personalization for Shopware 6
infos.description:
Nosto enables retailers to deliver authentic and relevant online shopping experiences across every touchpoint and every device.

Through our Commerce Experience Platform (CXP) that's designed for ease of use, Nosto empowers retailers to build, launch, and optimize personalized commerce experiences without the need for dedicated developer resources or a lengthy implementation process. As a result, leading commerce brands in over 100 countries use Nosto to grow their business and delight their customers.


Commerce Experience Platform Product Offering

  • Personalization Core: Dashboard and Analytics, Catalog Explorer and Product Insights, A/B Testing and Optimization, Segmentation and Behavioral Insights, Out-Of-The-Box Integrations, Core Machine Learning Predictive Algorithms
  • Modules: Product Recommendations, Product Search, Category Merchandising, Content Personalization, Pop-Ups, Dynamic Bundles, Email Personalization, Visual User-Generated Content


With Nosto’s Commerce Experience Platform, you can:

  • Deliver dynamic, relevant, and authentic shopping experiences quickly and easily. Our intuitive interface and robust roster of out-of-the-box integrations make it so that you don't need a developer to deliver personalized experiences to each shopper who visits your online store.
  • Stay one step ahead of your shoppers. Our unique approach to updating product and shopper data in real-time means each customer’s experience is truly personalized. Say goodbye to irrelevant images, copy, and product impressions that can hurt your brand image and sales.
  • Guide customers at every turn. Our platform leverages the power of personalization, merchandising and visual UGC in more onsite interactions than any other platform. From complete search solution and category merchandising to automated product bundles, the opportunities to create valuable experiences are endless.
  • For those with a traditional Shopware store setup, we have easy-to-use placements for implementing personalized product recommendations and content. Those with headless or custom storefront setups can use our Session API to leverage our personalization capabilities in their custom setup.


If you need further help please follow this link for detailed documentation: https://overdosedigital.atlassian.net/wiki/external/3034087513/YjYxYTg3MDY4MWY1NDE5MmI4NWU0MDk5YmU1YWJjMDk?atlOrigin=eyJpIjoiNzRjZWNiZjA3NDgwNGFjYWE3ODJhNzc5Mjc3NjQwOWUiLCJwIjoiYyJ9
infos.installationManual:
Standard Shopware 6 plugin installation is applied here. 

If you're a user, please follow this official Shopware 6 guide - https://docs.shopware.com/en/shopware-6-en/extensions/myextensions#installing-extensions 

If you're a developer, you can follow this guide - https://www.shopware.com/en/news/using-composer-for-plugin-installation-in-shopware/
infos.shortDescription: Nosto's leading personalisation solution uses the power of Big Data (artificial intelligence) to understand your online shop and each of your visitors in detail!
infos.highlights:
Product Recommendation
A/B Testing
Category Merchandising
Content Personalization
Dynamic Bundles

changelog.text:
• Release date: 24.07.2023

  • Type of release: Patch


  • Fix: Resolved the issue when Recommendation filter was not working as intended for some users.

  • Fix: Resolved the issue when nosto widgets could cause error on the page where they were added.

• Release date: 12.07.2023

  • Type of release: Patch


  • Fix: Resolved the issue with configuration namings.

• Release date: 10.07.2023

  • Type of release: Major


  • Compatibility release with Shopware 6.5^

  • Fix: Replaced usage of removed classes & files.
  • Fix: Resolved the issue that some plugin users were able to encounter during data synchronization via the shopware admin panel.
  • Fix: Minor changes to extension configuration classes/templates ( at extension configuration page ).
  • New: Job Scheduler Update - implemented compatibility with Shopware 6.5^ versions.
  • New: Job Scheduler Update - Job scheduler handlers now do extend recommended interfaces.
  • New: Controller routes now have annotation declaration in the new format.
  • New: Some changes that were made do make the extension backwards-incompatible. You can see the dependencies in the composer.json file.

• Release date: 21.07.2023

  • Type of release: Patch


  • Resolved the issue that customers with high site visitor counts experienced when alot of data was stored in "restore cart" db table.

  • Resolved the issue that some customers may encounter with error in src build files

• Release date: 3.07.2023

  • Type of release: Patch


  • Fixed the bug with added criteria to Nosto sorting method

  • added cookie age when “Enable PLP Cache for Not Logged In Customers.” & “Enable Nosto Merchandising.” are active


IMPORTANT: plugin is not compatible with version 6.5.X.X yet.

• Release date: 18.05.2023

  • Type of release: Patch


  • Fixed issue when site visitor can encounter an error on storefront after reaching checkout and comming back to previous page.


IMPORTANT: plugin is not compatible with version 6.5.X.X yet.

• Release date: 18.05.2023

  • Type of release: Patch


  • Added "restore cart"/"abandoned cart" functionality support. Now Nosto service will receive "restore_cart" link alongside all other cart data.


IMPORTANT: plugin is not compatible with version 6.5.X.X yet.

• Release date: 16.05.2023

  • Type of release: Patch


  • Fix: Fixed issue that some users can encounter upon "Full product sync". Error message: Countable|array int provided

  • Fix: Duplicate text for nosto config option tooltip description ( adminpanel )


IMPORTANT: plugin is not compatible with version 6.5.X.X yet.

• Release date: 5.04.2023

  • Type of release: Patch


  • Fix: Added Nosto product identifier selection

  • Fix: Added all information related to cross-selling

• Release date: 21.03.2023

  • Type of release: Patch


  • Fix: ProductCloseoutFilter loading process for older versions

  • Fix: Removed main product variant config loader for an older version

• Release date: 15.03.2023

  • Type of release: Patch


  • New: Added main product information

Version 1.0.11

  • Release date: 02.03.2023

  • Type of release: Patch


  • Fix:  Fixed tag loading limitation issue.

• Release date: 28.02.2023

  • Type of release: Patch


  • Fix: Previously, tag input triggered the custom fields dropdown instead of the tag list dropdown. This is resolved now.

• Release date: 24.02.2023

  • Type of release: Patch


  • New: Added product labelling to the custom fields of Nosto Product

  • New: Added product number to the custom fields of Nosto Product

• Release date: 19.02.2023

  • Type of release: Patch


  • Added Nosto js object on CMS pages with addSkuToCart, addProductToCart, addMultipleProductsToCart methods

• Release date: 15.02.2023

  • Type of release: Patch


  • New: Added Cross-Selling synchronization

  • Fix: Fixed gross price calculation for Nosto product

• Release date: 26.01.2023

  • Type of release: Patch


  • New: Added ability to select inventory source in plugin settings

  • Fix: Nosto js issue on the checkout page

• Release date: 23.01.2023

  • Type of release: Patch


  • New: Added Recommended sorting option for merchandising

  • Fix: Fixed Nosto configuration saving and validation

• Release date: 13.01.2023

  • Type of release: Patch


  • New: Added compatibility with custom product pages

  • New: Added compatibility with non-scalar custom fields

  • New: Added domain selection for multi-domain shops

  • Fix: Category Merchandiser account issue

• Release date: 07.12.2022

  • Type of release: Patch


  • Fix: Category Merchandiser functionality restored

• Release date: 23.11.2022

  • Type of release: Patch


  • New: Added custom theme compatibility

  • New: Required fields are marked not required if the account is not enabled

  • Fix: Context is kept for background processes

  • Fix: Removed all data during uninstall process

  • Fix: Fixed server side generated cookies related to the permissions

  • Fix: Handled empty category, product image and product url cases

  • Fix: CSS removed "important" keywords

  • Fix: Fixed UI for Nosto CMS-element

• Release date: 16.11.2022

  • Type of release: Patch


  • New: Added api key validation in Nosto config

  • New: Added cookie permissions for Nosto tracking

  • New: Added compatibility with the latest versions of shopware

  • New: Added translations for whole module

  • Fix: Changed custom fields key to label in Nosto config
